document.full_text: japan's nuclear plant crisis spurred by the earthquake and tsunami should not deter planning for a second nuclear power station in iowa, the state's lieutenant governor said on monday.
document.title: japan crisis should not deter iowa nuclear plants: official
lines_and_colors: japan's nuclear plant crisis spurred by the earthquake and tsunami should not deter planning for a second nuclear power station in iowa, the state's lieutenant governor said on monday.
